snippet: The chief operating officer of Facebook has signed the Giving Pledge, a campaign in which the world’s richest people vow to give away at least half their wealth....
abstract: Securities and Exchange Commission filings indicate Facebook chief operating officer Sheryl Sandberg plans to transfer nearly $100 million of her Facebook shares to fund for charitable causes; donations are expected to benefit women's empowerment and anti-poverty efforts.
lead_paragraph: The chief operating officer of Facebook has signed the Giving Pledge, a campaign in which the world’s richest people vow to give away at least half their wealth.

headline.main: Sheryl Sandberg Said to Plan $100 Million in Charitable Giving
headline.print_headline: Sandberg Plans to Use $100 Million for Charity
